I have no idea about the problem that other people are having. But this game works perfectly for me. And it is a great one. I extracted it from the archive and then mounted it with Daemon Tools.  It was smooth.

Bikes for Ride! Riding bicycles for work commutes and errands not only saves customers money, but generates a fantastic deal of revenue at local and state levels, reports Elly Blue for Grist. I found this here: Economic effect of biking vs. driving tremendous economic impact on communities By conservative estimate, each person in the U.S. who drives a vehicle to work could conserve between $ 3,000 and $ 12,000 annually. Yearly, the total grows by approximately $ 1,000.
